ygData.subject: Re: Charisma
ygData.msgSnippet: Faction also plays a role.  Geting +faction with things like MerchantsOfRivervale is very good! ... From: Eain Bankins [mailto:eain@home.com] Sent: Wednesday,
ygData.messageBody:
Faction also plays a role. Geting +faction with things like
MerchantsOfRivervale is very good!

-----Original Message-----
From: Eain Bankins [mailto:eain@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 1:15 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Charisma


From: Eain Bankins <eain@...>

I have a dark elf, CHA 89, I sell cracked staves for 1p 8g at my guild,
so go figure...

E

Shawn Alley wrote:
>
> From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...>
>
> you can't raise your stats ever. But you can get magical items that
> will raise them I guess. Charisma makes a HUGE difference when buying
> and selling. I have a dark elf with low charisma and enchant silver
for
> example cost 4p 5g something. I haven't bought it with higher
charisma
> yet (have to get high enough before I attempt to impersonate a dark
elf
> and go in there). With my high elf and a charisma of 102 I'm selling
> cracked staffs for 1p 3g? something like that. Well over a plat
anyway.
> I'm pretty sure my dark elf would get less than a plat for that same
> item. Think of the differences when you want a spell that's 30+ plat
or
> armor for 100s or 1000s of plat!
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jay [mailto:jayalan@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 9:54 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Charisma
>
> From: Jay <jayalan@...>
>
> How important is charisma? I only have 76, is there a way to raise it?
> If not will it be that impotant down the road that I should ditch this
> character for a new one with more charisma? I'd hate to do that, I'm
> almost to level 7, but if it's going to hamper me down the road...
>
> Let me know what ya think, thanks,
> Jalaar...Solesuk Ro
>
>
